title: American Math Society Survey Data
description:
Description
Counts of new PhDs in the mathematical sciences for 2008-09 and 2011-12
categorized by type of institution, gender, and US citizenship status.
reference: These data are produced yearly by the American Math Society.

parameters.count: The number of individuals of each type in 2008-09
parameters.citizen:
a factor with levels Non-US, US giving
citizenship status
parameters.type:
a factor with levels I(Pu) for group I
public universities, I(Pr) for group I private universities, II
and III for groups II and III, IV for statistics and
biostatistics programs, and Va for applied mathemeatics programs.
parameters.count11: The number of individuals of each type in 2011-12
parameters.sex:
a factor with levels Female, Male of the
recipient

format: A data frame with 24 observations on the following 5 variables.
